channel.title: NPC Help
channel.description:
:|
I just created a server everything works fine.
BUT
when i go to shops For example when I trade the bandit who sells God armor or Trade the one who says Sell hoods or Some other shops the server FREEZES
and I didn't touch anything else, except changing the compile and runserver to the way it supposed to be.
Anyone know how to fix this problem?

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:9, topic:291626”]he hasnt been “coding”[/quote]He claims he’s been “coding servers” for 6 years now, since 2003.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“madbob420, post:6, topic:291626”]Sometimes the client isn’t suppose to run
with a special source. Maybe try using a different client.
I highly doubt that it haves something to do with your source.
If you are receiving an error message in your source a.k.a. “Run.Bat”.
Post it so that we could tell you exactly what your problem is.[/quote]How long have you been “coding” now?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @sun_slayer sun_slayer
item.description:
@sun_slayer wrote:

well im using Allstar v2 source and Moparscape with Aryan client

WEll it didnt show any errors

just this one

couldn’t open output stream to log file name.############.log

sorry forgot to put the client name b4

im using moparscape and all-starscape v2

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @madbob420 madbob420
item.description:
@madbob420 wrote:

Sometimes the client isn’t suppose to run
with a special source. Maybe try using a different client.
I highly doubt that it haves something to do with your source.
If you are receiving an error message in your source a.k.a. “Run.Bat”.
Post it so that we could tell you exactly what your problem is.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Lol.

You didn’t even tell us your source and you’re like “gime cliant pl0x”.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

If your using the client that came with your server, its most likely the correct one
just you will need to change some client sided stuff.

Read full topic

which client is it then? give me the link to it?
